sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Report, User } from '../../types'; interface DashboardStats { totalReports: number; pendingReports: number; completedReports: number; totalUsers: number; totalCollectors: number; totalPoints: number; recentReports: Report[]; topCitizens: User[]; } const AdminDashboard: React.FC = () => { const [stats, setStats] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardStats(); }, []); const fetchDashboardStats = () => { // Mock data for admin dashboard const mockStats: DashboardStats = { totalReports: 156, pendingReports: 23, completedReports: 98, totalUsers: 342, totalCollectors: 15, totalPoints: 12450, recentReports: [ { _id: '1', reportId: 'WR-2024-001', citizenId: 'citizen_1', citizenName: 'John Doe', citizenEmail: 'john@example.com', location: { type: 'Point', coordinates: [-74.006, 40.7128], address: '123 Main St, New York, NY' }, images: ['/api/placeholder/400/300'], description: 'Large pile of household waste', wasteType: 'household', status: 'pending', priority: 'high', statusHistory: [], createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() }, { _id: '2', reportId: 'WR-2024-002', citizenId: 'citizen_2', citizenName: 'Jane Smith', citizenEmail: 'jane@example.com', location: { type: 'Point', coordinates: [-74.007, 40.7129], address: '456 Oak Ave, New York, NY' }, images: ['/api/placeholder/400/300'], description: 'Overflowing recycling bin', wasteType: 'recyclable', status: 'verified', priority: 'medium', statusHistory: [], createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() } ], topCitizens: [ { _id: 'citizen_1', name: 'Alice Johnson', email: 'alice@example.com', role: 'citizen', points: 450, phone: '+1234567890', address: '789 Pine St', totalReports: 15, completedReports: 12, reportsSubmitted: 15, status: 'active', createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() }, { _id: 'citizen_2', name: 'Bob Wilson', email: 'bob@example.com', role: 'citizen', points: 380, phone: '+1234567891', address: '321 Elm St', totalReports: 12, completedReports: 10, reportsSubmitted: 12, status: 'active', createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() } ] }; setStats(mockStats); setLoading(false); }; const getStatusBadge = (status: string) => { const statusClasses = { pending: 'status-pending', verified: 'status-verified', assigned: 'status-assigned', 'in-progress': 'status-in-progress', completed: 'status-completed', rejected: 'status-rejected' }; return statusClasses[status as keyof typeof statusClasses] || 'status-pending'; }; if (loading) { return (
); } if (error) { return (

{error}

); } if (!stats) return null; return (
{/* Header */}

Admin Dashboard

{/* Stats Grid */}

Total Reports

{stats.totalReports}

Pending Reports

{stats.pendingReports}

Completed Reports

{stats.completedReports}

Total Users

{stats.totalUsers}

Active Collectors

{stats.totalCollectors}

Total Points Awarded

{stats.totalPoints.toLocaleString()}

{/* Recent Reports and Top Citizens */}
{/* Recent Reports */}

Recent Reports

{stats.recentReports.map((report) => (

{report.wasteType}

{report.location.address}

{new Date(report.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

{report.status}
))} {stats.recentReports.length === 0 && (

No recent reports

)}
{/* Top Citizens */}

Top Citizens

{stats.topCitizens.map((citizen, index) => (
#{index + 1}

{citizen.name}

{citizen.email}

{citizen.points} pts

{citizen.reportsSubmitted || 0} reports

))} {stats.topCitizens.length === 0 && (

No citizens data

)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

); }; export default AdminDashboard;
